name: Fast Stride
componentes: VSM (um pouco de pó de prata)
descricao:
The billowing flames of a dragon cover your feet, granting you explosive speed. For the duration, your speed increases by 20 feet and moving doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks. When you move within 5 feet of a creature or object that isn’t being worn or carried, it takes 1d6 elemental damage from your trail of heat. A creature or object can take this damage only once during a turn.
	**Enhance Spell**. For each 2000 extra mana spent in this spell, you increase your speed by 5 feet and the damage by 1d6, up to 6000 extra mana (i.e. 15 extra feet and 3d6 extra damage).
